mapper.insert: insert into s_b_call_alarm (main_code, alarm_id, alarm_code, alarm_name, alarm_status, create_time, modify_time) values (#{mainCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alarmId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{alarmCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alarmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alarmStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select main_code, alarm_id, alarm_code, alarm_name, alarm_status, create_time, modify_time from s_b_call_alarm
